mapper.select: SELECT id, passwd, name, email, TO_CHAR(regdate, 'yyyy-MM-DD DAY') AS regdate FROM member ORDER BY regdate ASC
SELECT id, passwd, name, email, TO_CHAR(regdate, 'yyyy-MM-DD DAY') AS regdate FROM member WHERE id = #{value}
SELECT id, passwd, name, email, TO_CHAR(regdate, 'yyyy-MM-DD DAY') AS regdate FROM member WHERE id = #{value} AND passwd = #{value}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (id, passwd, name, email, regdate) VALUES (#{id}, #{passwd}, #{name}, #{email}, TO_DATE(#{regdate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))
